name: Gun Runner (Mnemonic Productions)
overview: An incoming message was received from Military Patrol Vessel Alpha Niner. MPVA9 reported that they were under pirate attack before communications were suddenly cut off. You're going to have to be careful if you want to earn any creds in this sector and you'll need to make deliveries if you want to earn enough to upgrade your ship. Don't forget to check the commodities exchange, there are some deals to be had there.
